name: IPDC Training Institute
description: As a Public Charitable Trust, Swaminarayan Vidyapith has always focused on providing youth with value-based development and has been doing so for the last two decades under the guidance of his Late Holiness Pramukh Swami Maharaj. Foreseeing the increased national importance of more holistic education, BAPS has spent the previous seven years harnessing its expertise to provide value-based education to a broader audience; by developing syllabi for the nation’s youth, which can be easily integrated into the existing structure of government and private educational institutions.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Empowering humankind to learn, love and live noble values.
ShortDescription: As a Public Charitable Trust, Swaminarayan Vidyapith has always focused on providing youth with value-based development and has been doing so for the last two decades under the guidance of his Late Holiness Pramukh Swami Maharaj.
enhanced_description: IPDC Training Institute, founded as a Public Charitable Trust (Swaminarayan Vidyapith), has evolved from its initial focus on value-based development for youth over two decades. In the past seven years, it has expanded its expertise to provide value-based education syllabi designed for easy integration into existing government and private educational institutions. Functioning as a provider of training eLearning software and course authoring tools, IPDC aims to address key business objectives, including accelerating skill development and learning efficiency, improving employee happiness and engagement, and fostering a more diverse and inclusive workforce. The institute utilizes an 'exciting', 'relatable', 'interactive', 'enjoyable', and 'tangible' approach, combining academic principles with practical application to ensure holistic development.
